content:
Captain Remy beams with pride as he looks around the Sea Serpent. "Thank you, Jean-Baptiste. She's served me well over the years, and I've done my best to keep her in top condition. She's fast, agile, and can hold her own in a storm. With a good crew and a bit of luck, there's no challenge she can't handle."

As the journey continues, the crew members go about their duties with practiced efficiency, and you can see that Captain Remy runs a tight ship. Some of the sailors share tales of their past adventures, while others engage in friendly competitions to pass the time, such as arm wrestling or dice games.

As you observe the crew, you have the opportunity to learn more about their individual stories, skills, and motivations, or you can try your hand at some of their games and activities. You can also continue conversing with Captain Remy or explore the ship further.

What would you like to do?
